events.body: Premature until the softfork is accepted, no?
(Also, much prefer CHECKMATURITYVERIFY for a name...)
I also think this is too early. Until the softfork goes through this is still effectively a NOP.

issue.title: Add op csv tests to script_tests.json
Post CSV softfork trigger TODOs

events.body: are we going to do this in 0.13.0?

events.message: Rename NOP3 to CHECSEQUENCEVERIFY in rpc tests

events.body: @laanwj This will not cleanly cherry-pick to 0.12, would you like be to create the backport for 0.12 as a separate PR?
@btcdrak Yes, I think a separate backport PR would make sense in this case, as it's probably easier to  do the replacement another time than try to coax git into cherry-picking this.
